SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GameLocalView

Class LocalStationPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GameLocalView.LocalStationPlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
OtherStation, PersonalStation
public abstract class LocalStationPlayer extends Object
The class contains the information that represent the station of a player that the view can access. It is created by the LocalModel The class is abstract and is extended by two other classes: - OtherStation, that represents another player's station. - PersonalStation, that represents the personal station.

  • Method Details

    • reconstructSchema

      public void reconstructSchema()
      The methods initialized the cardSchema and creates it from the content of the placedCardSequence. First each element of the cardSchema is null, then the position that are occupied according to the placeCardSequence are filled.

    • placeCard

      public abstract void placeCard(PlayableCard cardToPlace, String anchorCardCode, Direction direction)
      Method used to place a card in the Station given:
      Parameters:
      cardToPlace - , the card we want to place.
      anchorCardCode - , the anchor card code of the card we want to place the card from.
      direction - , the direction in which we want to place the card, given the anchor card.

    • placeInitialCard

      public void placeInitialCard(PlayableCard initialCard)

      Parameters:
      initialCard - , the initial card the user wants to place in the station.

    • getCoord

      public Tuple<Integer,Integer> getCoord(String cardCode)
      The coordinates of the card whose cardCode is given.
      Parameters:
      cardCode - , the card code of the card.
      Returns:
      the coordinates of the card if it was previously placed, (-1, -1) otherwise.

    • getPlacedCardAtPosition

      public PlayableCard getPlacedCardAtPosition(int x, int y)
      Returns the card at given position, else null
      Parameters:
      x - first dimension of the matrix
      y - second dimension of the matrix
      Returns:
      the card at given position, if the card is not present returns null

    • getPlacedCardSequence

      public List<Tuple<PlayableCard,Tuple<Integer,Integer>>> getPlacedCardSequence()
      To return the list of placed card and their positions.
      Returns:
      the list containing the card placed in the station so far and their position.

    • cardIsPlaceable

      public abstract boolean cardIsPlaceable(PlayableCard cardToPlace, PlayableCard anchor, Direction direction)
      To ask if a card is placeable given:
      Parameters:
      cardToPlace - , the card we want to place.
      anchor - , the anchor card from which we want to place the card.
      direction - , the direction in which we want to place the card.
      Returns:
      a boolean that is true only if the card can be placed in that position.
